Button.TooltipReference: Hides a corpse after you have looted it
Changes the dark blue con color in chat and track to use zeal color #15.
Toggles the zeal input setup for any input in game, giving you a more modern input (ctrl+c, ctrl+v, left, right, shift left+right for highlighting, home, end ect)
Toggles your helmet
Stops windows from closing on escape but still drops target
Pressing Escape will not close the raid window when this option is enabled.
Alt key will show ALL item Tooltips in open bags
Toggles Autostand if Spellbook is open (so you can turn pages with movement keys)
Toggles on and off the 50+ class names on /who and other areas
Toggles Tell Windows
Toggles Tell Window Session History
Enables alternative link all delimiter
Enables lock in container context menu (requires the bag to be re-opened to take effect)
Exports current inventory and spellbook to files when /camp is executed
Toggles Buff Timers
Toggles Recast Timers
Left align recast timer tooltip
Display a dialog when invited to a group
Apply raid class colors to group window
Enables auto-consent to any /tc sent by a group or raid member
Enables persistent confirmation dialog position
Logs when items are moved from cursor to trade window
Enables storing keybinds per character
Enables storing autojoin chat channels per character
More consistent 'lock on' behavior and adds strafe
Enable Zeal /follow mode (reliability, distance, and pitch)
Enables the single click auto-transfer of stackable items to open give, trade, or crafting windows
Disables third person click on self (/selfclickthru)
Generates a consider message upon left click
Equip items from your bags by right clicking them.
Require Ctrl with right click to loot corpse
Require Ctrl with right click to pop-up context menus
Replaces the spell info display content with 'enhanced' information
Autostand when trying to cast
Toggles brown skeleton models
Toggle Classic Music
Suppress missed note messages from other bards
Suppress fizzle messages from non-grouped casters
Enable per character /assist on settings
Emits a message and clears target if /assist fails
Uses the 2HS animation for 2HB
Use the alternative transport spellset categories
Suppress lifetap 'I feel better' message
Suppress messages from other's pets
Generate reports of non-melee dmg (spells, dmg shield) from others
Makes buff non-button area click thru when locked (use ctrl+click to unlock)
